thread.title: Spectre Actress Naomie Harris doesn't 'believe' that Daniel Craig doesn't want to be Bond anymore!!
thread.title_full: Spectre Actress Naomie Harris doesn't 'believe' that Daniel Craig doesn't want to be Bond anymore!! - The Times of India

author: Hiren Kotwani
title: Spectre Actress Naomie Harris doesn't 'believe' that Daniel Craig doesn't want to be Bond anymore!!
text:
Spectre actress Naomie Harris has revealed that she does not believe "for a second" that her co-star Daniel Craig wants to be stop being 007 — despite his hints of Spectre being his last Bond film.
READ: Naomie Harris living her childhood dream
The actress, who plays 'Eve Moneypenny' in the franchise, spoke out after Daniel Craig recently stated that Spectre was probably his last 007 outing.
Naomie Harris, who called the actor the "ultimate Bond", said he had been joking because of the physical hardship involved in filming the action movies.
She said, "To say that he doesn't want to come back — I just don't believe it for a second. It's been blown completely out of proportion. Daniel worked 128 days on this movie and he works incredibly hard."
Reportedly filming Spectre was quite tough as Craig had injured his leg while filming action scenes in the Austrian Alps.
Naomie Harris added: "He injured himself on the movie and came straight back after the operation and worked despite being in pain. He continued to do his stunts, despite his pain. I've seen him work 15-hour days and then come back and train for two hours. He does all of his own stunts unless the insurance won't allow it."
